channel.title: A few quests
channel.description:
So I'm trying to raise my combat stats up[strength, attack, defense] including mage, range, and prayer. I need a few quests that will give me a decent amount of exp in any of those skills.
[u]Quests that are done:[/u] [s]MM Requirement quests MM Lost city And a few other non-important quests.[/s]
[u]Quests do be done:[/u] Dragon Slayer Possibly waterfall quest

item.title: A few quests
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:6, topic:316217”][quote author=cows_be_sacred link=topic=412794.msg3041686#msg3041686 date=1259170872]

Fight Arena = 12k attack exp.

Finished that. Isn’t it part of the MM requirements?
[/quote]No. The Grand Tree and Tree Gnome Village. Im like trying to find the items that will be useful in the quest ATM.[/quote]
Yeah but isn’t fight arena a sub-quest of one of those quests?

Read full topic
